vocabulary_session_id.description: Unique session identifier for the vocabulary task.

vocabulary_recording_acoustic_task_id.description: The unique identifier for the vocabulary recording acoustic task.

vocabulary_item_difficulty_1.description: Indicates the participant's reported difficulty level for vocabulary item 1.

vocabulary_item_difficulty_2.description: Indicates the participant's reported difficulty level for vocabulary item 2.

vocabulary_item_difficulty_3.description: Indicates the participant's reported difficulty level for vocabulary item 3.

vocabulary_item_difficulty_4.description: Indicates the participant's reported difficulty level for vocabulary item 4.

vocabulary_item_difficulty_5.description: Indicates the participant's reported difficulty level for vocabulary item 5.

vocabulary_item_difficulty_6.description: Indicates the difficulty level reported by the participant for vocabulary item 6.
